mapper.select: SELECT u.userNum, u.fcmToken FROM sellerdetail sd JOIN product p ON sd.sellerNum = p.sellerNum JOIN user u ON sd.userNum = u.userNum JOIN point po ON sd.userNum = po.userNum WHERE sd.isAlarm = 1 AND p.cateNum = #{cateNum} AND p.status = 1 AND u.fcmToken IS NOT NULL AND po.point >= 500 GROUP BY u.userNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm (reNum, seNum, content1, content2, type, targetNum) VALUES (#{reNum}, #{seNum}, #{content1}, #{content2}, #{type}, #{targetNum})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM alarm WHERE reNum=#{reNum} AND isChecked = 0 ORDER BY createdAt DESC
